subject:
Re: [sugar] [PATCH] services/presence/server_plugin: Stop using
	private API of telepathy-python and dbus-python
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

On Thu, 24 May 2007 at 13:47:38 -0400, Dan Williams wrote:
> Looks good; is this just the right way to do it or was the TP API
> changed to enable this?

Both, I think - the Tp API was changed a while ago, but the examples
weren't updated. When I've finished merging the PS I also have some
patches to make the examples more exemplary!

	Simon
